title: It Exists: Pop Tart Riding Wallet
content:
Inspired by James Huang, who wanted a more secure way to carry Pop Tarts on rides, the Tough box for Pop Tarts just launched on Etsy for $12.50. We know some of you love to ride with Pop Tarts (we don’t blame ya!) and figured you might be intrigued by this clever invention. There’s a slot for your I.D. and debit card and one Pop Tart pack making it the perfect Pop Tart riding wallet. These come in a variety of colors and are 3D printed in the USA. Check out more at Etsy.
